description:
This account discusses mainly (but not exclusively) the activities of Tech Foundations - the Atos Group business line leading in managed services, focusing on hybrid cloud & infrastructure, employee experience and technology services, through decarbonized, automated and AI-enabled solutions.

Eviden designs the scope composed of Atos’ digital, cloud, big data and security business lines. It will be a global leader in data-driven, trusted and sustainable digital transformation. Visit Eviden: https://www.linkedin.com/company/eviden/ and eviden.com

Atos is a global leader in digital transformation with 95,000 employees and annual revenue of c. €11 billion. European number one in cybersecurity, cloud and high-performance computing, the Group provides tailored end-to-end solutions for all industries in 69 countries. A pioneer in decarbonization services and products, Atos is committed to a secure and decarbonized digital for its clients Atos is a SE (Societas Europaea), listed on Euronext Paris.

The purpose of Atos is to help design the future of the information space. Its expertise and services support the development of knowledge, education and research in a multicultural approach and contribute to the development of scientific and technological excellence. Across the world, the Group enables its customers and employees, and members of societies at large to live, work and develop sustainably, in a safe and secure information space.

name: Atos

updates.text:
How to anticipate and prepare for problems in the cloud?
Watch this webinar to learn more on crafting a solid cloud strategy. We also address sustainability, security, availability, efficiency, and cost-control goals to take your cloud from zero to infinity and beyond! 💡

👉 http://spr.ly/6047SfDUJ

#CloudAdvisory #BusinessStrategy #AdvancingWhatMatters

🌿Download our Sustainable Workplace Paper! 🌿

We're excited to share our latest research based on data from 28.5 million devices.🤳 This comprehensive study reveals innovative ways to enhance the financial, environmental, and social value of every device, all while enriching the employee experience.

Dive into the full paper in collaboration with Nexthink, Tier 1, Circular Computing and learn how to make your workplace more sustainable➡️ http://spr.ly/6049s6TNx

#SustainableWorkplace #Innovation #EmployeeExperience #AdvancingWhatMatters

⚽ As the information technology partner for UEFA EURO 2024™  and beyond, Atos is harnessing its expertise in complex technology management, ensuring seamless support across iconic tournaments like the UEFA EURO championships and UEFA Nations League Finals.

At the Gartner® IT Infrastructure, Operations & Cloud Strategies Conference, Clive Grethe, will be shed light on how we are elevating the experience for fans and stakeholders alike, bringing resilience, efficiency, and innovation - making each match an experience to remember. 
 
To learn more talk to our experts at the event, visit http://spr.ly/6041sHOXd

#GartnerIO #DigitalTransformation #AtosBridge #CloudCatalyst

🏆 We have been awarded in the "Innovation and Technological Solutions" category during the #Palmarès2024 of the Global Sports Week, in the presence of Gil Avérous, French Minister of Sports and key industry players sport and innovation last week in Paris.

This unique event highlights the French economic players who have made the most significant contributions to the success of the last major international sporting events (GESI) organized in the territory.

We are honored to have been recognized for our advancements in technological innovation. This award reflects our ability to provide cutting-edge digital solutions capable of supporting global events.

Thank you to all of our teams for their expertise and daily commitment, allowing us to revolutionize sport and offer unforgettable sporting experiences.

Learn more here ➡️ http://spr.ly/6047sE70z

#GSWParis #FutureOfSport #Sport #PALMARÈS2024

✨ Caring begins with truly listening. At Atos, we've been perfecting this practice for years. With innovative solutions, we leverage data to predict incidents before they arise, ensuring seamless support and proactive care for your teams.

Discover how Atos is reimagining the future of work with an employee-centric digital workplace that prioritizes well-being and productivity.

👉 Learn more about Atos Digital Workplace: http://spr.ly/6046S4oZK

#AdvancingWhatMatters #AtosDigitalWorkplace #DigitalWorkplace #EmployeeExperience

Join the ILO GBDN Conference Live! 📆 

Atos, Chair of the ILO GBDN for 2023/24, proudly participates in the 11th Annual Conference: “From Margin to Mainstream: Disability in Business” on 27-28 November 2024 in Geneva, streamed online.

🗣️ Catch Neil Milliken, Atos' Global Head of Accessibility, speaking on 27 Nov from 13:30 - 14:30 CET.

Expect best practices, new resources on disability-inclusive ESG, and more. Accessible in English, French, and Spanish with live captioning.

🔗 See event details here: http://spr.ly/6042SfVHC

#DisabilityInclusion #GBDN #Accessibility #LiveEvent

📢 Atos & Eviden Theater Session at Microsoft Ignite!

Discover how to "Unleash GenAI at IOC: A Simple Yet Powerful Platform for Fast Adoption and Growth." 📈 
During the session, Mischa Van Oijen will discuss how our platform swiftly and efficiently navigates complex compliance requirements. We will deep dive into our fast, accurate solutions that meet current needs and pave the way for future growth. 🚀

Experience how simplicity and power come together to transform your operations. For more details ➡️ http://spr.ly/6049SfwUT 

#MSIgnite #CloudJourney #GenAI #DataSecurity #Sustainability #Innovation #TechExperts #DigitalTransformation

🎉 Celebrating growth and learning! 🎉 

For the past six months, IfM Engage at the Institute for Manufacturing (IfM), University of Cambridge has had the privilege of delivering two bespoke talent development programmes in partnership with global IT company Atos – FUEL for Emerging Leaders and GOLD for Technology Leaders. With a long-lasting collaboration since 2013, this year’s edition of the two programmes had dozens of participants from over 20 countries, creating a truly globally diverse experience. 🌍 

The participants’ journeys have been a testament to the transformative potential of learning: the programmes empower Atos leaders with the tools, skills, and mindset needed to shape the future of their organisations.

Our executive education team help large organisations with result and impact driven talent acceleration programmes. Find out if our highly bespoke approach is right for your organisation: https://lnkd.in/eVmhwhsY

The FUEL for Emerging Leaders programme supports high-potential talent to grow into international leaders with cross-cultural collaboration skills. The participants are guided through a series of modules and undertake in-company team projects culminating in a presentation at the HQ in Paris.

GOLD for Technology Leaders, delivered in collaboration with Paderborn University, is aimed at senior professionals to help them develop a strategic view of technologies and a multi-strand end-to-end perspective in terms of business, value, people, and environment.

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all those who have been part of these programmes: the mentors, teams, experts and leaders who have championed these valuable and transformative learning opportunities. 🙏 

Darren Austin, Martin Pfeil, Swati Valsangkar, Rik Robarts, Jaime Carrillo, Judith Shawcross, Amanda Bamford, Claudia Peverini, Lory Peresson-Robinson, Jaspar Robertson, Simon Oberthür, Dennis Wolters, Iva zlateva

#IFMInstitute #FUELProgram #GOLDProgram #LeadershipDevelopment #Innovation #AtosEmergingLeaders #TalentDevelopment #FutureLeaders #ExecutiveEducation #ProfessionalDevelopment #IfMEPD

Like Andy, your expertise in digital technology can make a difference in wildlife conservation and biodiversity monitoring. 🐼 

We’ve partnered with WWF to focus on wildlife conservation around the world. Our joint efforts include using AI and satellite imagery for biodiversity monitoring in East Africa, creating new algorithms to predict disease outbreaks in Southeast Asia, and supporting the SMART partnership by developing software to assist rangers working in protected areas across more than 90 countries.

Become Essential - Join us. Learn more ➡️ https://lnkd.in/e2GqZSmr 

#BecomeEssential #PowerOfWe #AtosTeam @Andy Wallace

In today's fast-paced sports world, athletes juggle demanding schedules filled with travel, media duties, and financial responsibilities. So how can we help them stay focused on their game? 🏅

Ana Margarita Fernandez Reid, Solution Manager at Atos, shares how a well-designed athlete engagement portal can make a difference. 

By simplifying admin tasks, these portals free up valuable time for athletes to train and prepare, boosting on-field performance. Plus, they support athletes' personal and professional growth through education, financial literacy, and development resources.

Read the full article here:
👉 http://spr.ly/6047SKejF

#CX #Sports #AthleteExperience #Performance #Innovation
